short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sample and edit audio directly from your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The web audio recorder

Sample is a in-browser sampler that makes recording web audio easy and fun

** For existing users that moved to newest version **
Please make sure you reinstall the extension to get the latest features and bug fixes 

** For all users **
If you face any issues please reach out at romanwhatwhat@gmail.com


Top features:
* 44.1kHz sampling rate recording
* Stereo or mono recording
* A local file library that saves your recent recordings for future editing/ download
* Up to 15 minutes of continuous recording time 
* Reverse playback
* Export samples in WAV or MP3
